7#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_VALIDATEGLOBALINITIALIZER_H_
8#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_VALIDATEGLOBALINITIALIZER_H_
9
10namespace sh
11{
12
13class TIntermTyped;
14
15// Returns true if the initializer is valid.
16bool ValidateGlobalInitializer(TIntermTyped *initializer,
17 int shaderVersion,
18 bool isWebGL,
19 bool hasExtNonConstGlobalInitializers,
20 bool *warning);
21
22} // namespace sh
23
24#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_VALIDATEGLOBALINITIALIZER_H_
